turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Cher, Are you busy at the moment?, I need a favor please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, what would you like me to do?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will please call Starbucks for me, I just saw that they have a Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte and that sounds so good, don't you think?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it does. Are you going to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I will pick it up at 10 a.m. at the Starbucks on South loop 336 here in town.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get the Vente size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want any sweetner?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh I might as well have a Splenda in it, thanks for reminding me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so the Vente Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte with 1 Splenda. Any other extra toppings or add in's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so you want it in your name Sandy Smith and your cell number 123-456-7890 and you will pick this up at 10 a.m today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you and please put it on my account with them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, let me place your order and I will call you right back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi Sandy, your order is placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, I called the Starbucks on South loop 336 here in town and I ordered you 1 Venti Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte with 1 Splenda in it, for pick up today at 10 am, in your name Sandy Smith, phone number 123-456-7890. It was charged to your account and the receipt and total are being text to your cell phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful, thanks. It sounds so good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, thank you and bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome, Bye.

items.name: Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte
